com.smjourney.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smjourney.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destructible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Debris, Ship

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Destructible
    A general Entity, and object with an ID and one or more parts, that can be placed on a group of cells within a map to function. It is given a value of armor durability, which dictates the "health" or "HP" of the Entity, and a value for size dictating how many cells the Entity takes up. Each Entity is divided into EntityPartitions, located a single cells on the map, with the Entities themselves occupying the GROUP that the individual cells make up.

        public void placeSelfOnMap(Map<EntityPartition> m,
                  CellGroup cg)
        Places the Entity on the Map upon a certain group of cells
        Parameters:
        m - the Map in which the Entity will be placed on
        cg - the CellGroup in which the Entity will be placed upon
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - the entity is on a map already
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - the entity cannot be placed on the map at the specified cell group

      • placeSelfOnMap

        public void placeSelfOnMap(Map<EntityPartition> m,
                  Cell referenceCell)
        Places the Entity on the Map upon a certain group of cells given a top-left reference cell and the size of the Entity
        Parameters:
        m - the Map in which the Entity will be placed on
        referenceCell - the top-left-most cell of the group of cells in which the Entity will be placed upon

      • removeSelfFromMap

        public void removeSelfFromMap()
        Removes the Entity from the Map
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - the entity is not on a map
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - the map contains a different entity at the current cell group
